name: Wordpunk
description:
Prepare to challenge yourself to a typing contest against a powerful foe. Manage to survive multiple levels of typing challenges. Compete against your friends to see which one of you is the ultimate typist.

More than 70 000 different quotes, which you will have to type out. Try to beat all of them.

>> Good luck soldier!

Thanks for visiting my game's page! I appreciate all of you players around the world.

This is my very first try at creating a game. I'm a CS student and this was my summer holiday project, mainly to learn Unity. I tried to recreate a game from my first year at high school which was made in Greenfoot. You can download that game too if you want (Download -> wordpunk.gfar), but you will also need the Greenfoot IDE.

I hope you will enjoy the game and if you do, donations are always welcome! At least I can get a coffee <3
